entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:32 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 07:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
